content: {"name": "Hillside Senior Recreation Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Coordinator: ILA\tDUNHAM\t9739262214\t\nStart: 07/07/2025\tEnd: 08/22/2025", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "265 Hollywood Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Hillside", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07205", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.6924901, "longitude": -74.2231305}, "phones": [{"number": "(908) 355-1245", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Students & staff only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Meals must be eaten on site."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "All children under 18 are eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Summer Meal Program"}]}
